mapper.update: update tb_file_aliyun_mapping aliyun set aliyun.path=#{path}, aliyun.aliyunKey=#{aliyunKey}, aliyun.uploadState=#{uploadState}, aliyun.remark=#{remark}, aliyun.dataType=#{dataType}, aliyun.suffix=#{suffix}, aliyun.foreignKeyId=#{foreignKeyId}, aliyun.syncFlag = #{syncFlag} where aliyun.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select aliyun.id,aliyun.path,aliyun.aliyunKey,aliyun.uploadState,aliyun.remark,aliyun.dataType,aliyun.suffix,aliyun.foreignKeyId,aliyun.syncFlag from tb_file_aliyun_mapping aliyun where aliyun.uploadState = #{state} and aliyun.syncFlag = 0 limit 0,100

select aliyun.id,aliyun.path,aliyun.aliyunKey,aliyun.uploadState,aliyun.remark,aliyun.dataType,aliyun.suffix,aliyun.foreignKeyId,aliyun.syncFlag from tb_file_aliyun_mapping aliyun where aliyun.uploadState = 3 limit 0,#{pageSize}
